skinny.translation[0].definitions[0].def: very thin, especially in a way that is unattractive
skinny.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Some supermodels are far too skinny.
skinny.translation[0].definitions[1].def: skinny trousers fit tightly all the way down the legs
skinny.translation[0].definitions[2].def: made with skimmed milk (=milk with all the fat and cream removed from it)
